meza-ext-desc: Extension to capture all the little things meza (https://github.com/enterprisemediawiki/meza) wants
ext-meza-transferpages-conflicting-heade: ($1) pages conflicting on source and destination
ext-meza-transferpages-identical-header: ($1) pages identical on source and destination
ext-meza-transferpages-unique-header: ($1) pages only on source - good to transfer to destination
ext-meza-transferpages-transferring-summ: The following jobs were added to the job queue to transfer pages from this wiki to $1. Depending on the state of your job queue this may take a while.
ext-meza-transferpages-transferring-dele: Transferring [[$1]] to '[[$2:$1|$2]]'. Deleting page from this wiki.
ext-meza-transferpages-transferring-redi: Transferring [[$1]] to '[[$2:$1|$2]]'. Redirecting this wiki's page there.
ext-meza-transferpages-transferring-dono: Transferring [[$1]] to '[[$2:$1|$2]]'. Leaving this wiki unchanged.
action-viewserverstatus: view Apache httpd and PHP info pages
